item.description:
Sharing our New Possibilities Free Monthly Class with you. Hope you'll join us!

•Are you feeling a little bummed out that summer is over?
•Do you wish you could feel like you do on vacation every day?

Well guess what? You can! This evening, in addition to doing one or two guided meditations on feeling good, I’ll be leading you through a process to help you bring a vacation frame of mind into every day. The benefits are beyond what you might be imagining.

Remember the short article I shared with you on living every day in a vacation frame of mind? (Now in our files section) Turns out that this frame of mind is pretty much identical to an enlightened, allowing state of mind.

Join us in this special evening and you’ll:

• Experience deeply relaxed states
• Get into really “feeling good” states
• Be able to bring a vacation frame of mind into your everyday life – even work, and still be productive – perhaps even more so!
• Learn some tricks so you can have more emotional choice, versus being at the effect of moods and emotions happening to you.

Sound good? Hope you’ll join us for this wonderful opportunity!

Remember, this is a public event, so all are welcome; and the more people we have, the better the collective energy and experience. So, please invite others to sign up and join you. Forward this to your friends, family and groups. The class is appropriate whether you are a beginner to meditating, or experienced.

Space is limited, so registration is required. Please let us know if your plans change, too, so we won’t be waiting for you unnecessarily.

A big thank you to Wayland Wellness for co-sponsoring this evening with New Possibilities Coaching!
item.how_to_find_us: Go to back of front lobby, near water cooler and go upstairs.

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: Free Evening of Guided Meditations and Living in a Vacation Frame of Mind
